biotools.summary: Patpat stands for Proteomics Aiders Telescope, a public proteomics dataset search framework that simply passes in protein identifiers to search for relevant datasets and returns metadata to aid your research.

bioschemas.name: Patpat
bioschemas.summary: Patpat stands for Proteomics Aiders Telescope, a public proteomics dataset search framework that simply passes in protein identifiers to search for relevant datasets and returns metadata to aid your research.
